question: plzzz tell me any good dua to reconcile with my husband he is very mad at me and don't trust me and want ti give me divorce, i love him too much and wanna live with him

ANSWER

Jazakallah for writing to the institute about your problem.%0D%0A%0D%0AYou write about your husband's anger and dissatisfaction with you and that he wants to divorce you. Sister, please elaborate why he does not trust you. Why is he very angry with you to the extent that he wants to divorce you? It is pleasing to note that despite what you say about the situation, you are keen to maintain the marriage. Please give me more information as soon as possible so that I can understand your situation a little more clearly.%0D%0A%0D%0AIn the meantime I suggest that you increase zikr, dua, darood shareef, recitation of the Quran and nafl salaah, especially Tahadjud salaah. Plead with Allah Ta'ala to grant to you what you desire most, recite often 'Hasbiyallaahu wa ni'emal wakeel'%0D%0A%0D%0AI await your reply. May Allah Ta'ala ease your difficulties and remove the conflict between you and your husband. May He increase understanding and love between you and your husband. Ameen.%0D%0A%0D%0Aand Allah Ta'ala Knows Best%0D%0A%0D%0ASister Fadila%0D%0ASOCIAL DEPT.%0D%0A%0D%0ACHECKED AND APPROVED: Mufti Ebrahim Desai
